README:
Fountain Crawler
================

General Description:
This project is a Python crawler for Flickr website. I developed this project in order to mine Flickr website and search for a text query such as "drinking fountains" to find all photos with geo-locations which have mentioned the text query as meta-data. This idea is useful for crawling/indexing different hotspots in a city which regular search engines like Google and Yahoo fail to index. Check the following links for a few examples:

http://arxiv.org/abs/1202.3504
http://www.kazemjahanbakhsh.com/codes/fountain.html
http://www.kazemjahanbakhsh.com/codes/geocrawler.html

If you have questions, contact me @ k.jahanbakhsh@gmil.com .
description: A Python script to crawl Flickr website to discover and index new locations and places in a city.
